thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Calfrac Announces $650 Mln Offering Of Senior Notes, Accordion Exercise And Intention To Repay Second Lien Term Loan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Calfrac Announces $650 Mln Offering Of Senior Notes, Accordion Exercise And Intention To Repay Second Lien Term Loan
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Calfrac Well Services Ltd:
* CALFRAC ANNOUNCES US$650 MILLION OFFERING OF SENIOR NOTES, ACCORDION EXERCISE AND INTENTION TO REPAY SECOND LIEN TERM LOAN
* CALFRAC WELL SERVICES - UNIT INTENDS TO OFFER UP TO US$650 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 ISSUED UNDER NEW INDENTURE
* CALFRAC WELL SERVICES - UNIT INTENDS TO USE PORTION OF PROCEEDS TO FUND TENDER OFFER TO BUY FOR CASH UPTO ALL OUTSTANDING 7.50% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2020
* CALFRAC WELL SERVICES - ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT TO AMEND ITS CREDIT FACILITIES TO EXERCISE C$100 MILLION OF ACCORDION CAPACITY UNDER CREDIT FACILITIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
